Package it.unibo.ds.core.codes

package it.unibo.ds.core.codes
  • Class
    Description
    AlreadyConsumedCodeException
    Signals that the OneTimeCode has already been consumed.
    AlreadyGeneratedCodeException
    Signals that the OneTimeCode has already been generated.
    CodeManager<C>
    An interface modeling a OneTimeCode manager, which exposes functions to generate, (in)validate and verify one-time-codes.
    CodeManagerImpl<C>
    A base implementation of CodeManager which implements main core logic, independent of any technology.
    CodeRepository<C>
    An interface with method to store/retrieve from a data source the one-time-codes data.
    NotValidCodeException
    Signals that the OneTimeCode is not valid.
    OneTimeCode
    An interface modeling a one-time-code, i.e.
    OneTimeCodeImpl
    A simple OneTimeCode implementation.
